remarks: Deduction form of bound-variable hypothesis builder ~ hbbi . (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2002.)
statement:
hbbid.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
hbbid.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> A. x ps ) ) $.
hbbid.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch -> A. x ch ) ) $.
hbbid $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ps <-> ch ) -> A. x ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
